entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Salaberry-de-Valleyfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:11 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 6:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: SW 20 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
